price: Mu by’ukuri ibyo ni amafunguro yacu adateze kuzashira.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَرِزۡقُنَا مَا لَهُۥ مِن نَّفَادٍ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā lariz'qunā mā lahu min nafādin
